metadata.title: CVE-2013-0162 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The diff_pp function in lib/gauntlet_rubyparser.rb in the ruby_parser gem3.1.1 and earlier for Ruby allows local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on a temporary file with a predictable name in /tmp.

criterions.comment: ruby-parser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
